html:
Game Prototyping

You will be taught from scratch how to design, develop and enhance your own early-stage game prototypes using prototyping techniques and scripting in an industry-standard game engine. This will include how to manage your time effectively.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Identify different project management methodologies in relation to creating prototypical gameplay experiences.

+  Interpret technical design choices in development in accordance with the basic theories and concepts of games prototyping.

+  Apply the underlying principles of games prototyping methods to produce early-stage game prototypes.

+  Discuss the technical development of prototype games through development.

Module Content:
